name: phpcompatibility/phpcompatibility-joomla
description: A set of sniffs for PHP_CodeSniffer that checks for PHP version compatibility for Joomla projects.

suggest.dealerdirect/phpcodesniffer-composer-ins: ^0.4.3 || This Composer plugin will sort out the PHPCS 'installed_paths' automatically.
suggest.roave/security-advisories: dev-master || Helps prevent installing dependencies with known security issues.
